mapper.insert: insert into t_admin_program (program_id, parents_program_id, level, program_name, program_sort, use_yn, reg_date, update_date, location) values (#{programId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentsProgramId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{programName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{programSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update t_admin_program set program_id = #{programId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parents_program_id = #{parentsProgramId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, program_name = #{programName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, program_sort = #{programSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_yn = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_date = #{regDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where admin_program_seq = #{adminProgramSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select admin_program_seq, program_id, parents_program_id, level, program_name, program_sort, use_yn, location ,substring(reg_date, 0, 5)||'-'||substring(reg_date, 5, 2)||'-'||substring(reg_date, 7, 2) AS reg_date ,substring(update_date , 0, 5)||'-'||substring(update_date , 5, 2)||'-'||substring(update_date , 7, 2) AS update_date from t_admin_program where admin_program_seq = #{adminProgramSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and use_yn<>'N'

select admin_program_seq, program_id, parents_program_id, level, program_name, program_sort, use_yn, location ,substring(reg_date, 0, 5)||'-'||substring(reg_date, 5, 2)||'-'||substring(reg_date, 7, 2) AS reg_date ,substring(update_date , 0, 5)||'-'||substring(update_date , 5, 2)||'-'||substring(update_date , 7, 2) AS update_date from t_admin_program where 1=1
AND substring(reg_date, 0, 5) BETWEEN #{searchStartDt} AND #{searchEndDt}
AND program_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
order by program_sort desc, program_id asc
